```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(gganimate)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
library(gapminder)
```

```{r}
gapminder_plot <- ggplot(gapminder) +
    aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, colour = continent, size = pop,
        frame = year) +
    geom_point(alpha = 0.8) +
    scale_x_log10()
gganimate(gapminder_plot)
```

```{r}
gganimate(gapminder_plot, filename = "gapminder-gganimate.html")
```
